actions.text: On agreeing to the Livingston amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment restores $37 million rescinded for the Congregate Housing Services Program; and offsets this by increasing to $75 million the amount rescinded from NASA science, aeronautics, and technology activities.
purpose: An amendment to restore the entire $37 million rescinded by the bill for the Congregate Housing Services program, and offsetting this by increasing by an equal amount (to $75 million) the amount rescinded by the bill from NASA science, aeronautics, and technology activities.
